price: It is He Who sends down rain from the sky, from it you drink, and by it plants thrive on which you pasture your livestock.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗۖ لَّكُم مِّنۡهُ شَرَابٞ وَمِنۡهُ شَجَرٞ فِيهِ تُسِيمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī anzala mina al-samāi māan lakum min'hu sharābun wamin'hu shajarun fīhi tusīmūna
